oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account of the relationship between the sun, the moon and the stars, according to the !kun. It includes a description of the growth of the moon. 1) p.9136v: pencil sketches showing the phases of the moon, 2) Lloyd admits in a note on p.9137v that her questioning of the narrator as to the moon and the sun's parentage might have been 'injudicious', 3) This story is found in Book XI & XII-2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The moon, the sun and the stars
